column2: Paralyzed rear legs and lethargic. No tumor evident.
DCT-TVA; Braf CA; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, spleen, tumor(?)/ear
Skull was intact, blood in brain
No tumor chunks frozen or cell line attempted.
No obvious flaw in spine that would have led to paralysis.
Potential tumor forming around left ear-- if present, it is very small.
